system.availability: Can help prevent financial errors and mistakes. When a Misfortune event occurs for a Rogue Trader who possess this (or one of their subordinates who possesses it), Subtract 5 from the result of the roll to determine the severity of the misfortune.
system.cost: Doesn't need to be on the character's person, Merely needs to be able to be accessed readily (such as it being housed on the Character's vessel).
